# LeCoder MConnect

> The productivity layer for AI coding agents. Control Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Cursor, Aider from anywhere.

## What is LeCoder MConnect?

LeCoder MConnect is an open-source tool that lets you run AI coding agents on your machine and control them remotely from your phone, tablet, or any device with a browser. It creates secure tunnels via Cloudflare so you can monitor and interact with your agents from anywhere—no port forwarding required.

## Who makes this?

LeCoder MConnect is built by LeSearch AI, an open-source initiative focused on AI agent tooling, developer productivity, and research reproduction.

- Organization: https://github.com/lecoder-ai
- Main repo: https://github.com/aryateja2106/lecoder-mconnect
- npm package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/lecoder-mconnect

## Quick Install

```bash
# Requires Node.js 20+ and cloudflared
brew install cloudflared  # or equivalent for your OS
npx lecoder-mconnect
```

For detailed installation: https://github.com/aryateja2106/lecoder-mconnect/blob/main/install.md

## Core Features

1. **Multi-agent support**: Run Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Cursor Agent, Aider, Codex in parallel
2. **Mobile-first UI**: Touch-optimized terminal interface with smooth scrolling
3. **QR code connect**: Scan to connect instantly from your phone
4. **Secure tunnels**: Cloudflare encryption, no port forwarding needed
5. **Read-only default**: Safely monitor without accidental interruption
6. **Command guardrails**: Block dangerous commands, require approval for risky operations

## Use Cases

### Solo developer workflow
Run AI agents on your desktop, step away, monitor progress from your phone. Get notifications when agents need input or hit errors.

### Raspberry Pi / home server
Run MConnect on a Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB RAM recommended). Control your AI agents from iPad or phone. Build and test applications remotely.

### Team collaboration (coming soon)
Share terminal sessions with teammates. Real-time cursors, typing indicators, chat alongside terminal.

### Enterprise (coming soon)
Container isolation per agent. SSO/SAML integration. Audit logs for compliance. Air-gapped deployment with local AI (Ollama).

## CLI Usage

```bash
# Basic usage
npx lecoder-mconnect

# With preset
npx lecoder-mconnect --preset single        # One Claude agent
npx lecoder-mconnect --preset dev-review    # Claude + Shell
npx lecoder-mconnect --preset research-spec-test  # Gemini + Claude + Shell

# Custom agents
npx lecoder-mconnect --preset custom --agents '[{"type":"claude","name":"AI"},{"type":"shell","name":"Term"}]'

# With guardrails
npx lecoder-mconnect --guardrails strict

# Help
npx lecoder-mconnect --help
```

## Supported AI Agents

| Agent | Status | Command |
|-------|--------|---------|
| Claude Code | Tested | `claude` |
| Gemini CLI | Tested | `gemini` |
| Cursor Agent | Tested | `cursor` |
| Aider | Supported | `aider` |
| OpenAI Codex | Supported | `codex` |
| Any CLI tool | Supported | Custom command |

## Architecture

```
┌─────────────────┐     ┌──────────────────┐     ┌─────────────────┐
│   Your Phone    │────▶│ Cloudflare Tunnel│────▶│  Your Machine   │
│   (Browser)     │     │   (Encrypted)    │     │   (MConnect)    │
└─────────────────┘     └──────────────────┘     └─────────────────┘
                                                         │
                                                         ▼
                                                 ┌───────────────┐
                                                 │  AI Agents    │
                                                 │ Claude/Gemini │
                                                 └───────────────┘
```

## Security Model

- **No accounts required**: No signup, no cloud storage
- **Ephemeral sessions**: URLs expire when CLI stops
- **Token authentication**: Each session requires unique token
- **Read-only default**: Must explicitly enable write mode
- **Guardrails**: Configurable command blocking
- **No telemetry**: We don't track anything

## Project Structure

```
lecoder-mconnect/
├── packages/cli/          # Main CLI (published to npm)
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── cli/commands/  # start, attach, daemon
│   │   ├── pty/           # Terminal management
│   │   ├── web/           # Web client
│   │   ├── tunnel.ts      # Cloudflare integration
│   │   └── guardrails.ts  # Command safety
├── apps/website/          # Marketing site (Next.js)
├── install.md             # AI-agent installation instructions
├── llms.txt               # This file
└── AGENTS.md              # Context for AI coding agents
```

## Related Projects by LeSearch AI

### LeCoder cGPU CLI
Command-line tool for Google Colab GPU access. Run A100 experiments from your terminal.
- GitHub: https://github.com/aryateja2106/LeCoder-cgpu-CLI
- npm: `npm install -g lecoder-cgpu`

### Nested Learning Reproduction
Implementation of Google Research's Nested Learning paper.
- GitHub: https://github.com/aryateja2106/nested-learning

### Neural Memory Reproduction
PyTorch reproduction of TITANS, MIRAS, and NL papers on neural memory systems.
- GitHub: https://github.com/aryateja2106/neural-memory-reproduction

## Troubleshooting

### cloudflared not found
Install cloudflared for your platform:
```bash
# macOS
brew install cloudflared

# Ubuntu/Debian
curl -L https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflared/releases/latest/download/cloudflared-linux-amd64.deb -o cloudflared.deb
sudo dpkg -i cloudflared.deb
```

### Node.js version error
MConnect requires Node.js 20+:
```bash
node --version  # Check version
nvm install 20  # Install with nvm
```

### QR code not displaying
Ensure your terminal supports Unicode. Try a different terminal emulator or use the URL directly.

### Tunnel connection issues
Check your internet connection. Cloudflare tunnels require outbound HTTPS access.

## API / WebSocket Protocol

Clients communicate via WebSocket at `ws://localhost:3456` (or tunnel URL).

### Client → Server
```json
{ "type": "input", "agentId": "string", "data": "string" }
{ "type": "resize", "agentId": "string", "cols": 80, "rows": 24 }
{ "type": "create_agent", "config": { "type": "claude", "name": "AI" } }
{ "type": "list_agents" }
{ "type": "mode_change", "readOnly": false }
```

### Server → Client
```json
{ "type": "session_info", "sessionId": "string", "agents": [] }
{ "type": "output", "agentId": "string", "data": "string" }
{ "type": "agent_status", "agentId": "string", "status": "running" }
{ "type": "command_blocked", "agentId": "string", "reason": "string" }
```
